p: Previous studies showed that P. oleracea, L. multiflorum, and E. crus-galli were sensitive to winter savory ( Satureja montana L.), which exerted a total inhibitory effect on the seed germination of the three weeds at all doses (0.125, 0.25, 0.50, and 1 µL/mL) tested, and peppermint ( Mentha piperita L.), which completely inhibited the seed germination of L. multiflorum and significantly affected the seed germination of P. oleracea and E. crus-galli at the highest dose (1 µL/mL) applied [ 52].
